title: Modern 3 bedroom apartment in great neighborhood
posting_body: Now available: Gorgeous 3 bed 2.5 bath apartment with all the amenities.
Rents start at $5,865.00 a month for these popular 1979 Sq.
Ft. square foot units, so call to schedule a tour today!
National Green Building Standard Gold Certified
Rooftop Deck with Exceptional Views, Fire Pit, BBQ Grills & Lounge Seating
Demonstration Kitchen with Outdoor Grills & Dining Space
Hotel-Inspired Pool with Luxe Cabanas, Lounge Seating, Green Wall Accents & More
Wellness Center with Zen Garden, Dry Sauna, Steam Room and Fitness Center
Fitness Studio with Cardio & Weight Stations
Co-Work Space with Multiple Seating Areas
Game Room with HDTV, Ping-Pong & Shuffle Board
4th Floor Terrace with BBQ Grills, Outdoor Games & Lounge Seating
Pet-friendly apartment homes with pet spa
